name: another-react-router
description: Another react router is a npm package, that allowes developers and users comfortable route between pages on their web applications

scripts.build: bun lint && tsup src/browser/index.ts src/cli/index.ts --format cjs,esm --dts
scripts.pub:beta: bun run build && pnpm publish --no-git-checks --access public --tag beta
scripts.pub:next: bun run build && pnpm publish --no-git-checks --access public --tag next
scripts.pub:release: bun run build && pnpm publish --access public

author: fesyse
